    • Method Detail

      • getSymmetricKey

        public static byte[] getSymmetricKey(android.content.Context context,
                                     int usageKeyType)
        Creates in dependency of the master key a deterministic symmetric key.
        Parameters:
        context - the Android app context
        usageKeyType - the usage key type, in dependency of the given type, one unique deterministic key will be derived
        Returns:
        byte[] array regarded as a symmetric key

      • getSalt

        public static byte[] getSalt(android.content.Context context,
                             int saltSize)
        Return a masterkey-dependent salt of desired salt size in bits
        Parameters:
        context -
        saltSize - either 128, 256 or 512 bits
        Returns:

      • getSymmetricKey

        public static byte[] getSymmetricKey(android.content.Context context,
                                     java.lang.String usage,
                                     int keySize)
        Creates in dependency of the master key a deterministic symmetric key.
        Parameters:
        context - the Android app context
        usage - the usage, in dependency of the usage description and the desired key size, one unique deterministic key will be derived. Make sure to determine the usage by a string defined by at most 16 bytes!
        keySize - the desired key size, in dependency of the usage description and the desired key size, one unique deterministic key will be derived. Allowed key sizes: 128, 256 or 512 bit.
        Returns:
